mapper.insert: insert into submissions(email, pid, submitTime, state, normalSubmit, timeUsed, memoryUsed, info) values (#{email}, #{pid}, #{submitTime}, #{state}, #{normalSubmit}, 0, 0, '')
mapper.update: update submissions set state = #{state}, timeUsed = #{timeUsed}, memoryUsed = #{memoryUsed}, info = #{info} where email = #{email} and pid = #{pid} and submitTime = #{submitTime}
mapper.select: select count(*) from submissions where pid = #{pid}
